00036 #define STRINGIFY(x) #x
00037 
00041 #define TOSTRING(x) STRINGIFY(x)
00042 
00052 #define LOGI(STRING) RainbruRPG::Exception::Logger::getSingleton().log(__FILE__,TOSTRING(__LINE__),1,STRING );
00053 
00063 #define LOGW(STRING) RainbruRPG::Exception::Logger::getSingleton().log(__FILE__,TOSTRING(__LINE__),2,STRING );
00064 
00074 #define LOGE(STRING) RainbruRPG::Exception::Logger::getSingleton().log(__FILE__,TOSTRING(__LINE__),3,STRING );
00075 
00088 #define LOGA(X,STRING) RainbruRPG::Exception::Logger::getSingleton().logAssert(__FILE__,TOSTRING(__LINE__),X,STRING );
00089 
00090 
00091 #define LOGCATS(STRING) RainbruRPG::Exception::Logger::getSingleton().logCatStr( STRING );
00092 
00093 #define LOGCATI(X) RainbruRPG::Exception::Logger::getSingleton().logCatInt( X );
00094 #define LOGCATB(X) RainbruRPG::Exception::Logger::getSingleton().logCatBool( X );
00095 
00096 #define LOGCAT() RainbruRPG::Exception::Logger::getSingleton().logCat(__FILE__,TOSTRING(__LINE__));
00097 
00098 #define LOGCATFREE() RainbruRPG::Exception::Logger::getSingleton().logCatFree();
00099 #define LOGCATF(X) RainbruRPG::Exception::Logger::getSingleton().logCatFloat(X);

00102 using namespace std;

00104 namespace RainbruRPG{
00105   namespace Exception{
00106 
00115     enum tLogLevel{
00116       LL_INFO=1, 
00117       LL_WARN=2, 
00118       LL_ERR=3   
00119     };
00120 
00129     enum tLogOutType {
00130       LOG_STDOUT, 
00131       LOG_FILE,   
00132       LOG_BOTH    
00133     };
00134 
00183     class Logger: public Singleton<Logger>{
00184     public:
00185       Logger();
00186 
00187       void log( const char* file, const char* line,
00188                 int id, const char *msg);
00189       void logMessage( std::string msg );
00190 
00191       void logAssert( const char* file, const char* line,
00192                       bool b, const char *msg);
00193 
00194       void logCatFree();
00195       void logCat(const char* file, const char* line);
00196       void logCatStr(const char*);
00197       void logCatInt(int);
00198       void logCatFloat(float);
00199       void logCatBool(bool);
00200 
00201       void setLogLevel(tLogLevel l);
00202       void setLogType(tLogOutType t);
00203       void setFilename(const char* );
00204 
00205     private:
00210       Logger(const Logger& obj);
00211 
00216       Logger& operator=(const Logger& obj);
00217 
00218 
00219       void openFile();
00220 
00221       void out(std::string s);
00222 
00227       tLogLevel logLevel;
00228 
00234       tLogOutType logType;
00235 
00239       const char *fileName;
00240 
00244       ofstream file;
00245 
00254       ostringstream oss;
00255     };
00256   }
